channel.title: Top Offers with Denim & Co
channel.desc: Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Today's Top Tech with HiSense
channel.desc: Discover the latest in tech in this show, including Hisense's innovative TVs, which boast exceptional clarity and breath-taking colour to take your home entertainment to the next level.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Top Offers with Denim & Co
channel.desc: Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Big Deal Morning Show
channel.desc: Start your week with a first look at some of the most exciting limited time offers at QVC across home, garden, beauty and fashion in The Big Deal Morning Show.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: MarlaWynne Sale
channel.desc: Discover chic style from MarlaWynne at excellent sale prices. Whether you're looking for classic wardrobe staples or bold statement pieces, there's something for everyone in this beautiful collection.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Lunchtime Show
channel.desc: Join us and our great panel of guests at lunchtime as they enjoy a chat and share a selection of fantastic products from top brands on QVC.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Love to Cook
channel.desc: Discover QVC's signature brand of high quality kitchenware. Innovative appliances loved by cooking novices and budding chefs alike, this range brings performance and practicality to your kitchen.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Fashion Sale
channel.desc: With specially chosen products from across the QVC range, there's something for everyone in the QVC Selection.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Finery London
channel.desc: Tune in to see the modern and sophisticated Finery London womenswear range, with a focus on stylish detail and beautiful fabrics to make sure your wardrobe reflects your individuality.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Jewellery Box
channel.desc: Indulge yourself in our collection of fine, exquisite jewellery. Each piece in our glamorous selection epitomises the height of luxury. Go on, you deserve it.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Margaret Dabbs London
channel.desc: Pamper your hands and feet with innovative hand and footcare formulas from international podiatrist and foot expert Margaret Dabbs.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Apricot Clothing
channel.desc: Discover Apricot fashion, showcasing chic wardrobe staples and elegant pieces to bring your style to life. From fabulous prints to bold pops of colours, discover how you can enliven your look today.
